meanings.definition: A plant that has a single cotyledon or seed leaf in its embryo
meanings.sent1: Monocotyledons are plants with only one seed leaf.
meanings.sent2: I learned in science class that monocotyledons have a single seed leaf.
meanings.sent3: The monocotyledons at the garden party were all showing off their single seed leaf.
meanings.sent4: In the field of botany, monocotyledons stand out like a lone seed leaf in a sea of dicotyledons.
meanings.sent5: The farmer carefully planted the monocotyledons, ensuring each one had its own seed leaf for growth.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the class Monocotyledones, characterized by having one cotyledon in the seed and an endogenous manner of growth
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful monocotyledons, each with a single seed leaf.
meanings.sent2: Monocotyledons are known for their unique growth pattern with one seed leaf.
meanings.sent3: The monocotyledons in the botanical garden seemed to be gossiping about their single seed leaf.
meanings.sent4: The field of monocotyledons stretched out like a vast sea of single seed leaves.
meanings.sent5: As the sun rose, the monocotyledons began their day, each one proudly displaying its single seed leaf.
